amendment.description: Amendment provides that a fine may be imposed for a first time paperwork violation if such violation has the potential to cause serious harm to the public interest; and adds two representatives from the Department of Health and Human Services, including a member from the Health Care Financing Administration, to the task force on streamlining paperwork requirements for small business concerns.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that a civil fine may be imposed for a first time violation if it has the potential to cause serious harm or present a danger to public health or safety; and adds two representatives from the Department of Health and Human Services to serve on the task force on streamlining information requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McIntosh amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
